@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.form.Action/@24682
sname
submitEmptyText
stype
boolean
sinputtype
truefalse
sgroup
Action
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
If set to <tt>true</tt>, the emptyText value will be sent with the form
when it is submitted.  Defaults to <tt>true</tt>.

@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.form.Action/@24686
sname
waitMsg
stype
string
sgroup
Action
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
The message to be displayed by a call to <a href="output/Ext.MessageBox.html#Ext.MessageBox-wait" ext:member="wait" ext:cls="Ext.MessageBox">Ext.MessageBox.wait</a>
during the time the action is being processed.
#$@text#$@

stype
string
sgroup
Action
Sdescription
#$@text#$@

during the time the action is being processed.
